programme.title: My Pet My Angel
programme.desc: After leaving her boyfriend, veterinary surgeon Kam Wai-ting (Lam Ha Mei) moves to Sai Kung with her beloved dog Donut and starts a new life. At her new workplace, Wai-ting meets animal communicator Wong Sing-yan (Chow Ka Lok). The duo often quarrel due to their different values regarding pets. In an accident, Sing-yan acquires skills for communicating with Donut, and a man and a dog gradually build a friendship and help each other. Sing-yan learns from Donut that Wai-ting has some love issues, so he helps her decipher her conundrum. The duo's relationship improves, and they gradually like each other. However, they do not have feelings of affection due to their age difference. Donut wants to play matchmaker for the duo, but it gets into hilarious situations. And its ideas even backfire. Each of the duo also has their own admirers, resulting in more obstacles in their relationship.

programme.title: Battle Against Evil, The

LI killed CHAR when he found out that CHAR was having an affair with his wife SUKI (LEUNG TSAND, JADE). SUKI was ashamed of her affair, so she committed suicide. After she died, CHAI was furious and killed LI. He used bad magic to turn LI's spirit into a cloud of hatred in order to prevent him from reincarnation. He also buried SUKI's spirit inside a figurine, hoping to resurrect her, but failed. LI's spirit wanders between heaven and hell for thousands of years. The aim of this program is to promote the beauty of Taiwanese folklore and bring folklore to life. This program showcases folk culture regardless of race or religion, and presents travel information in a fun way, combining easy-to-understand folk culture knowledge with the mission of passing on folk culture. The audience can learn more about folk cultural products such as handicrafts, antiques, temple folklore, as well as short stories about the gods, and information about local tourism. It is an educational and entertaining way to travel and learn about folklore.

programme.title: ESG Decoded
programme.desc: A sustainable future is a shared goal for Hong Kong as a whole, and financial investment and technological development play crucial roles in this process. "The Breakthrough Code: ESG" will take viewers to the TVB Green Summit to hear industry representatives share insights on the opportunities and new normal brought about by low-carbon transformation. Furthermore, hosts Wu Tianyou and Guan Fengxin will visit local university scholars to learn about the development of environmental technologies, including how to recycle waste and reduce carbon emissions, allowing the public to understand how government, business, and academia can work together to promote Hong Kong's sustainable development. With increasingly frequent extreme weather events, green transformation and sustainable development have become an irreversible trend. The TVB Green Summit brings together political and business elites from Hong Kong and Macau to discuss the new trend of environmental protection and plastic reduction in the tourism industry, and how cross-industry cooperation can effectively promote green transformation. The program will provide in-depth analysis. Tianyou and Fengxin will also introduce how to practice low-carbon living in clothing, food, housing, and transportation, encouraging everyone to achieve carbon neutrality.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60's in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development. He, KEUNG and HUI MAN BILL (Chan Kam Hung, Sunny) organized a development company and earned their first bucket of gold. When TIM was happy with his achievement, his enemy had broken his brother's legs. TIM suffered a great blow and decided to reform. On the other hand, BILL, stressed on principle, was surprised to find that his respected master in fact was corrupt.

programme.title: Homeland Guardian
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ho Ho-fai, together with his mentor Huo Qiquan and junior Chen Yaoyang, have solved numerous major cases, earning the nickname "The Three Tigers of O Division." However, during a raid to capture the ruthless criminal Zhou Xiong, they suffer a crushing defeatâ€”Huo Qiquan is killed, Zhou Xiong escapes, and a video of Ho Ho-fai kneeling to Zhou Xiong in an attempt to save his mentor goes viral online. Due to this incident, O Division's senior official Shao Feng's promotion is delayed, and overnight, Ho Ho-fai becomes the disgrace of the police force. Nevertheless, he does not give up and is determined to uncover the truth and avenge his mentor. At this time, his wife Cai Zhuoxin, who has been separated from him for a year, returns to Hong Kong from Canada with their son. Ho Ho-fai tries hard to win her back, but Cai Zhuoxin remains indifferent. Just as Ho Ho-fai suspected, Zhou Xiong's mastermindâ€”Louis from the EGM Fund in the United Statesâ€”is plotting an unprecedented financial attack on Hong Kong, aiming to disrupt the prosperity and stability of the international financial center. His evil plan is accidentally discovered by American hacker Gordon and Gordon's girlfriend Li Ke'er. To protect her hometown of Hong Kong, Li Ke'er mails a USB drive containing the EGM financial attack plan to Hong Kong, but is killed for her actions. Gordon rushes to Hong Kong to find the USB drive, while Louis sends his subordinate Anna to hunt him down.

programme.title: At The Threshold Of An Era
programme.desc: The property giant YIP WING TIM (Lo Ka Leung, Gallen) was born in the 60's in Hong Kong. His father, honest and righteous, was betrayed by his brother and put into prison. TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development. He, KEUNG and HUI MAN BILL (Chan Kam Hung, Sunny) organized a development company and earned their first bucket of gold. When TIM was happy with his achievement, his enemy had broken his brother's legs. TIM suffered a great blow and decided to reform. On the other hand, BILL, stressed on principle, was surprised to find that his respected master in fact was corrupt.

programme.title: The Flag of Iron

The Flag Of Iron is one of 20 movies that he directed featuring the utterly flabbergasting and physically exhausting action bits created by these five dudes. You have the good guys from the righteous clan versus the bad guys from the villainous clan and it's so filled with "don't-blink-or-you-will-miss-something" gags, you will need to watch it over and over again so you can see the things you missed.

Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager. When he meets his parents again, he denies them three times. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager. When he meets his parents again, he denies them three times. He even returns his flesh to his father and bones to his mother. Although he is resurrected again, he becomes a 'Vegetable'. Arrogant NAR JAR turns into a dummy. programme.title: Vital Lifeline & What's On Today
programme.desc: Urban dwellers often experience a hectic pace of life and high levels of stress, making them more susceptible to health problems. "The Strongest Lifeline" helps you unravel the secrets to good health. To start, the program features a four-episode series on common urban pain issues, covering headaches, shoulder and neck pain, back pain, and joint pain. Each episode invites medical experts to explain the causes of these conditions, as well as physical therapists and exercise specialists to teach appropriate exercises. With the growing trend of integrating Eastern and Western medicine, even American swimming champion Michael Phelps uses cupping therapy to relieve pain. Therefore, each episode also includes traditional Chinese medical diagnosis, complemented by treatments such as acupuncture, cupping, and the â€œSanfuâ€� herbal patch therapy, which is especially suitable during the hottest days of summer. In addition, Chinese medicine practitioners share recipes for nourishing soups, all of which can help regulate and improve your health.

Unwilling to see ON shoulder the burden on his own, KWAN KA-LOK (Linda Chung), the third of the siblings, turns to her supervisor GAO WANG-CHIM (Michael Tse) for assistance, resulting in her taking part in an indecent proposal. Her boyfriend, TING KOON-FUNG (Ron Ng), breaks up angrily with her when he finds out about their affair. programme.title: Homeland Guardian
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ho Ho-fai, together with his mentor Huo Qiquan and junior Chen Yaoyang, have solved numerous major cases, earning the nickname "The Three Tigers of O Division." However, during a raid to capture the ruthless criminal Zhou Xiong, they suffer a crushing defeatâ€”Huo Qiquan is killed, Zhou Xiong escapes, and a video of Ho Ho-fai kneeling to Zhou Xiong in an attempt to save his mentor goes viral online. Due to this incident, O Division's senior official Shao Feng's promotion is delayed, and overnight, Ho Ho-fai becomes the disgrace of the police force. Nevertheless, he does not give up and is determined to uncover the truth and avenge his mentor. At this time, his wife Cai Zhuoxin, who has been separated from him for a year, returns to Hong Kong from Canada with their son. Ho Ho-fai tries hard to win her back, but Cai Zhuoxin remains indifferent. Just as Ho Ho-fai suspected, Zhou Xiong's mastermindâ€”Louis from the EGM Fund in the United Statesâ€”is plotting an unprecedented financial attack on Hong Kong, aiming to disrupt the prosperity and stability of the international financial center. His evil plan is accidentally discovered by American hacker Gordon and Gordon's girlfriend Li Ke'er. To protect her hometown of Hong Kong, Li Ke'er mails a USB drive containing the EGM financial attack plan to Hong Kong, but is killed for her actions. Gordon rushes to Hong Kong to find the USB drive, while Louis sends his subordinate Anna to hunt him down.

programme.title: A STEP INTO THE PAST
programme.desc: HONG SHIU LUNG (KOO TIN LOK, LOUIS) is an secret agent in the 21st Century. He joins a pilot programme to fly back in time hoping that he will salvage his unforgettable love. However, something goes wrong during the mission. He is sent back to the Warring States Period. Emperor QI (LAM RAYMOND) has not been crowned yet and is kept hostage in Chiu. In order to return to the future, LUNG decides to help QI become emperor. With his wisdom and Kungfu, he is recognized and given important tasks. A modern man in the wrong era, he is bound to face difficulties. Before QI becomes emperor, LUNG is poisoned, attacked and seduced. He even gets involved in political wars. He is very much affected by his old memories and cannot forgive his father. CHING also keeps his distance from him because of his exotic nature and eventually sends him away with excuses. Luckily, he is saved by some kind people and becomes a General when he is still a teenager. When he meets his parents again, he denies them three times. He even returns his flesh to his father and bones to his mother. Although he is resurrected again, he becomes a 'Vegetable'. Arrogant NAR JAR turns into a dummy. Meanwhile, Shang Dynasty emperor ZHOU (CHENG TSE SHING, TIMOTHY) abandons his empire for his mistress TANGIE (WAN PIK HAR, IRENE) and puts the empire in jeopardy. NAR JAR pulls himself together again under his mother and friends' help and fights against ZHOU's army for the civilians.

programme.title: Homeland Guardian & What's On Today
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ho Ho-fai, together with his mentor Huo Qiquan and junior Chen Yaoyang, have solved numerous major cases, earning the nickname "The Three Tigers of O Division." However, during a raid to capture the ruthless criminal Zhou Xiong, they suffer a crushing defeatâ€”Huo Qiquan is killed, Zhou Xiong escapes, and a video of Ho Ho-fai kneeling to Zhou Xiong in an attempt to save his mentor goes viral online. Due to this incident, O Division's senior official Shao Feng's promotion is delayed, and overnight, Ho Ho-fai becomes the disgrace of the police force. Nevertheless, he does not give up and is determined to uncover the truth and avenge his mentor. At this time, his wife Cai Zhuoxin, who has been separated from him for a year, returns to Hong Kong from Canada with their son. Ho Ho-fai tries hard to win her back, but Cai Zhuoxin remains indifferent. Just as Ho Ho-fai suspected, Zhou Xiong's mastermindâ€”Louis from the EGM Fund in the United Statesâ€”is plotting an unprecedented financial attack on Hong Kong, aiming to disrupt the prosperity and stability of the international financial center. His evil plan is accidentally discovered by American hacker Gordon and Gordon's girlfriend Li Ke'er. To protect her hometown of Hong Kong, Li Ke'er mails a USB drive containing the EGM financial attack plan to Hong Kong, but is killed for her actions. Gordon rushes to Hong Kong to find the USB drive, while Louis sends his subordinate Anna to hunt him down.

programme.title: Colombiana
programme.desc: Pada tahun 1992, di Bogota, Colombia, baron dadah Don Luis Sandoval menghantar penguatkuasanya Marco dan sekumpulan lelaki bersenjata untuk membunuh rakan sekutunya Fabio Restrepo dan keluarganya kerana Fabio telah menentangnya dengan cuba meninggalkan kehidupan jenayahnya. Fabio memberikan anak perempuannya yang berusia sembilan tahun, Cataleya, kad memori komputer SmartMedia yang dimuatkan dengan maklumat mengenai perniagaan Don Luis dan memberitahunya itu adalah "pasport"nya; dia juga memberikan alamat bapa saudaranya Emilio di Chicago, yang akan menjaganya. Akhirnya, dia meninggalkannya dengan kalung orkid cataleya ibunya. Selepas Fabio dan isterinya Alicia ditembak mati, Cataleya melarikan diri dan mencari suaka di Kedutaan A.S. Dia diberikan laluan ke Amerika Syarikat selepas menyerahkan kad memori kepada kakitangan kedutaan. Walaupun pegawai Amerika cuba memindahkannya ke dalam sistem jagaan angkat, Cataleya menjejaki bapa saudaranya di Chicago dan memintanya melatihnya sebagai pembunuh.

In order to return to the future, LUNG decides to help QI become emperor. With his wisdom and Kungfu, he is recognized and given important tasks. A modern man in the wrong era, he is bound to face difficulties. Before QI becomes emperor, LUNG is poisoned, attacked and seduced. He even gets involved in political wars. programme.title: Vital Lifeline
programme.desc: Urban dwellers often experience a hectic pace of life and high levels of stress, making them more susceptible to health problems. "The Strongest Lifeline" helps you unravel the secrets to good health. To start, the program features a four-episode series on common urban pain issues, covering headaches, shoulder and neck pain, back pain, and joint pain. Each episode invites medical experts to explain the causes of these conditions, as well as physical therapists and exercise specialists to teach appropriate exercises. With the growing trend of integrating Eastern and Western medicine, even American swimming champion Michael Phelps uses cupping therapy to relieve pain. Therefore, each episode also includes traditional Chinese medical diagnosis, complemented by treatments such as acupuncture, cupping, and the â€œSanfuâ€� herbal patch therapy, which is especially suitable during the hottest days of summer. In addition, Chinese medicine practitioners share recipes for nourishing soups, all of which can help regulate and improve your health.

TIM, therefore, learned to be wise. He tried all means to take revenge and fortune seeking was always on top of his priorities. With the help from his best friend MA CHI KEUNG (Kwok Chun On), TIM took over an incomplete village housing development. He, KEUNG and HUI MAN BILL (Chan Kam Hung, Sunny) organized a development company and earned their first bucket of gold. When TIM was happy with his achievement, his enemy had broken his brother's legs. TIM suffered a great blow and decided to reform.
